articles.author: Don Reisinger
articles.title: Coronavirus will take a bite out of Apple’s iPhone business. The question facing analysts: ‘How big?’
articles.description: iPhone's sales could falter over the coronavirus, one prominent Apple analyst says. What do others think?

articles.author: Sy Mukherjee
articles.title: The first coronavirus vaccine is set for testing in China
articles.description: U.S.-based Gilead has struck a partnership with Beijing's China-Japan Friendship Hospital to test out an antiviral drug called remdesivir in actual humans in Wuhan.

articles.author: Rachel Schallom
articles.title: Coronavirus forces world’s largest work-from-home experiment
articles.description: Many people are trying to organize client meetings and group discussions via videochat apps, or discussing plans on productivity software platforms like WeChat Work or Bytedance’s Slack-like Lark.

articles.author: Grady McGregor
articles.title: Coronavirus forces China’s neighbors to make tough choices over health, fear and trade
articles.description: Thailand’s capital city of Bangkok has one of the highest rates of coronavirus outside of mainland China with 19 confirmed cases, masks are nearly ubiquitous in public spaces, and there are growing online calls to implement an outright ban on travelers from m…

articles.author: Karen Yuan
articles.title: ‘Irrational, herd behavior’— China’s markets plunge on coronavirus fears, but the selloff fails to spread overseas
articles.description: The Chinese markets re-opened on Monday with investors dumping shares. But so far, the worst seems confined to China.

articles.author: Naomi Xu Elegant
articles.title: Tokyo Olympics, Art Basel, K-pop shows: Asia worries about big events amid coronavirus spread
articles.description: As fears of a coronavirus outbreak spread, sporting events, K-pop concerts, and festivals are being cancelled and postponed across the globe.

articles.author: eamonbarrett
articles.title: China will struggle to spend its way out of the coronavirus economic slowdown
articles.description: China's economy is already under strain from two years of a U.S. trade war.

articles.author: Claire Zillman, reporter
articles.title: ‘The results look good so far:’ Thai doctors tout promising treatment for Wuhan coronavirus
articles.description: A drug cocktail has been effective in treating a seriously ill patient.

articles.author: Claire Zillman, reporter
articles.title: Chinese markets plummet amid coronavirus spread in first trading since New Year break
articles.description: Chinese stock markets had been closed since Jan. 23 for the New Year, a period that saw the virus outbreak escalate.
